attributes.action: seize all U.K assets and properties of the "church" of scientology.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
remove from our nation all influence of the so called church of scientology.
refuse any application for religious status.
investigate thoroughly all aspects of the organization.

rejection.details: Please supply a full name and address.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
